errors.error_description: The command to install the stable version uses an incorrect flag `-u`, which is not a valid flag for upgrading a package with pip. The correct flag is `--upgrade` or `-U`.
correction_candidates: Replace '$ pip install -u holidays' with '$ pip install --update holidays'.
Replace '$ pip install -u holidays' with '$ pip install --upgrade holidays'.
Replace '$ pip install -u holidays' with '$ pip install holidays --latest'.
Replace '$ pip install -u holidays' with '$ pip get holidays --upgrade'.
errors.golden_answer: Replace '$ pip install -u holidays' with '$ pip install --upgrade holidays'.
